scripts.watch: lerna exec --scope @uiw/react-textarea-code-editor -- tsbb watch "src/*.{ts,tsx}" --use-babel --cjs cjs & npm run css:watch
scripts.build: lerna exec --scope @uiw/react-textarea-code-editor -- tsbb build "src/*.{ts,tsx}" --use-babel --cjs cjs && npm run css:build && npm run css:build:dist
scripts.start: lerna exec --scope website -- npm run start
scripts.doc: lerna exec --scope website -- npm run build
scripts.bundle: lerna exec --scope @uiw/react-textarea-code-editor -- ncc build src/index.tsx --target web --filename editor
scripts.bundle:min: lerna exec --scope @uiw/react-textarea-code-editor -- ncc build src/index.tsx --target web --filename editor --minify
scripts.remove: npm run clean && lerna exec "rm -rf package-lock.json" --scope @uiw/react-textarea-code-editor --scope website
